title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Tánaiste
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Tánaiste
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Tánaiste 

and Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (tanaiste minister enterprise trade employment) order 2022

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Tánaiste
heading: 2. Bríd Murphy, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Bríd Murphy, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, is appointed to be a Special Adviser 
to the Tánaiste and Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment with effect 
from 7 March 2022. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

26 April, 2022. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 29th April, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [217] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR 
Le ceannach díreach ó 
FOILSEACHÁIN RIALTAIS, 
BÓTHAR BHAILE UÍ BHEOLÁIN, 
CILL MHAIGHNEANN, 
BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 8, 
D08 XAO6 

Teil: 046 942 3100 
r-phost: publications@opw.ie
